abstract: More photos of Tertulia, the chef Seamus Mullen's new Spanish gastropub in the West Village, reviewed by Sam Sifton this week.
snippet: More photos of Tertulia, the chef Seamus Mullen's new Spanish gastropub in the West Village, reviewed by Sam Sifton this week.
lead_paragraph: This week's restaurant review took me to Tertulia, the chef Seamus Mullen's new Spanish gastropub in the West Village. Have you been? An acquaintance of mine compared the experience to that of a sports bar serving excellent chicken wings, and declared it useless for all those over the age of 45.
